definition: power and position (politics)
authority/power/right/(literary) to weigh/expedient/temporary
surname Quan
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Saleh’s first priority is to stay in power and to be succeeded by his son.
sentences.chinese: 薩利赫的首要任務是保住權位並傳位於其子。

sentences.english: People who are in positions of power should be careful not to look down on those who work for them.
sentences.chinese: 居權位者應小心謹慎，不可輕視那些爲他們工作的人。
